mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students (full_name, furigana, nickname, email_address, address, age, sex, remark, is_deleted) VALUES (#{fullName}, #{furigana}, #{nickname}, #{emailAddress}, #{address}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{remark}, #{isDeleted})
INSERT INTO students_courses (students_id, course_name, start_date, end_date) VALUES VALUES (#{studentsId}, #{courseName}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE students SET full_name = #{fullName}, furigana = #{furigana}, nickname = #{nickname}, email_address = #{emailAddress}, address = #{address}, age = #{age}, sex = #{sex}, remark = #{remark}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted} WHERE id = #{id}
